name: Natuur en Recht (english name: Collective of Animal and Plant Stakeholders)
goal: Bring together species protection and animal welfare and maintaining sustainable use of natural resources. Enhance animal welfare by improving knowlegde on the keeping of animal species. Contribute to species protection by giving advice and training on European species protection legislaten. Helping to improve European species protection and animal welfare legislation in order to bring together social-economic benefits and ecological ideals.
euInitiatives: CITES, Invasive Alien Species, habitats directive, birds directive, animal welfare, animal transportation, zoos regulation
